event.title: July 2010 was 33,970 since then the population of San Juan increased

data.event: The population in July 2010 was 33,970 since then the population of San Juan increased since 2000 by +29.5%.
The community was organized in 1909, in part, due to the efforts of John Closner.
Austin Middle School which opened in 1970 and San Juan Middle School are inside the city.
